name: Into The Light glitch-process-3
description:
Original oil painting with chromatic aberration and diverge glitch AI process 3.
This series takes an original oil painting by artist Meredith Marsone and processes it 5 times creating a new artwork with each process. This processing mimics my state of mind around entering the digital era of art making, half AI, half human decision making, the result is an increasingly abstract image which perfectly, conceptually, captures my NFT life.
